posts.post_title: FS  Graded Turkey Red Hall of Famers
posts.post_content: Selling  T3 Turkey Reds--Tris Speaker=Willie Keeler--Chief Bender--Frank Chance--John McGraw--Sam Crawford--Joe Tinker--Johnny Evers--Plus the other HOF's (The big 4 are gone already)--check scans for prices and graded--Shipping is $15--Mailed Priority Mail--Paypal--Venmo or check,  thanks, Don
Don, I will take the Evers. PM me payment instructions. Thanks
